product.title: DEVELOPMENT THAT ACCELERATES YOUR BUSINESS
product.discription1: A modern web application that looks and feels like a mobile app. Fast, convenient, and can work offline. A perfect choice when you need ‚Äúan app-like experience without extra cost.‚Äù
product.discription2: From simple landing pages to complex multi-level websites. For a brand, small business, or company ‚Äî we build with precision, speed, and focus on results.
product.discription3: A convenient online store with cart, payments, and modern design. Built to sell effectively and stay stable even under high traffic.
product.discription4: A stylish and solid website for your company. Showcases your brand, team, services ‚Äî everything your clients need to see professionalism at first glance.
product.discription5: We create convenient tools for business operations: personal dashboards, management systems, service panels. Thoughtful and easy to use.
product.discription6: We integrate payments, CRMs, automation, APIs ‚Äî everything you need for smooth operations and growth. Flexible for your business tasks.
product.discription7: Even if your idea is something unusual ‚Äî let‚Äôs discuss it. Whatever you have in mind, we‚Äôre ready to build it.

contact.descr: Would you like a PWA for your company?

pwa.pageTitle: PWA / Web App ‚Äì Web Application Development | KSIBE

hero.title: PWA / Web App
hero.subtitle: Transform your website into a full-fledged mobile app. Home-screen icon, offline mode, and push notifications ‚Äî without App Store costs.

card1.title: Home-Screen Icon
card1.text: Users can install your app in one click directly from the browser. Your brand is always at hand on their phone screen.

card2.title: Instant Speed
card2.text: PWA caches the interface, so pages load instantly, even with a very weak internet connection.

card3.title: Offline Mode
card3.text: Users can browse your product catalog or contact information even without network access.

card4.title: Push Notifications
card4.text: Bring users back to your app by sending reminders about promotions, orders, or news.

card5.title: Perfect for Google
card5.text: Unlike native apps, a PWA is fully indexed by Google, bringing new customers from search.

card6.title: 70% More Cost-Effective
card6.text: One codebase for Web, iOS, and Android. No need to pay for developing three separate product versions.

info.title: Who Needs This?
info.list1: Online stores: Increase repeat sales using push notifications.
info.list2: Delivery services and taxi apps: Quick one-click access to placing an order.
info.list3: Media and blogs: Readers can access content even in the subway without internet.
info.list4: Startups: Fast MVP launch across all platforms at once.
